messages.msgSnippet: There s a hatchery that ships all kinds of eggs, I think they re called McMurtry or something along those lines. Google.com will be your friend in this
messages.messageBody:
There's a hatchery that ships all kinds of eggs, I think they're called
McMurtry or something along those lines. Google.com will be your friend in
this pursuit. ;)

Pam
